author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Soundtrack News
body:
I got this from Anime News Service, for those interested.

"The Soundtrack to the latest Lupin TV movie "$1 Money Wars" which was 
broadcast in Japan July 28th is out in Japan September 21st. The CD will 
contain BGM and OP and ED themes.

"A new Lupin III music collection CD "Lupin III Willpower Great Work War" is 
out in Japan September 21st at a retail price of 2,500 Yen."
